content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 18, "index": 12}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 32, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft leather, I need to place 4 rabbit hide in a square formation. The first step is to move one rabbit hide to the crafting grid, e.g. slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 18, "index": 12}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 32, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}]
